extension.summary: Stream and download scene releases from the links listed on Icefilms.info
extension.description:
Visit www.xbmchub.com for support.
Turns your XBMC into an instant free on-demand media-center. Stream and download to your library pure AVI scene releases, in DVD and HD720p quality. Browse and search the library of over 77,000 videos with metadata and posters. Never experience the frustration of dead video links!
Eminence is a skin that seeks simplicity, functionality, and elegance with a modern look
